input.text: For this video I presume you have registered a domain and have a Digital Ocean account, where you did setup your nameservers. We are going to create a Virtual Machine, or in this case, a Droplet. Where we are going to login via SSH. So, first we have to create a private/public key-pair. Go to the Digital Ocean website and navigate to Settings and then Security. Click Add SSH Key and paste in the content of your newly created public key. Give your key a name and click Add SSH Key.
